name: Phoronix - Iconify self-reference URLs
description: Marks all links in phoronix articles that point to other phoronix-sites with a small phoronix icon. External links are untouched.
additional_info:
Based on "Phoronix - mark self-reference URLs in text" by thomasg
https://userstyles.org/styles/55221/phoronix-mark-self-reference-urls-in-text

Compatible with "Phoronix nightmode" by Gust4f
https://userstyles.org/styles/118469/phoronix-nightmode
